createVault(address).details: Create a new ERC4626 vault for a pair of asset - Honey and register it with VaultAdmin.Reverts if the vault for the given asset is already registered.Reverts if the asset is zero address during `vault.initialize`.

params.asset: The asset to create a vault for.

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

returns.w: weights of all the registered assets.

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

isBasketModeEnabled(bool).details: On mint, basket mode is enabled if all collaterals are either depegged or bad.On redeem, basket mode is enabled if at least one asset is deppegged except for the collateral assets that have been fully liquidated.

returns._0: true if the asset is pegged.

params.goodCollateral: The ERC20 asset to provide in place.

mint(address,uint256,address,bool).details: Assest must be registered and must be a good collateral.The expectBasketMode flag avoid behavioral issues that may happen when the basket mode status changes after the client signed its transaction.

params.amount: The amount of ERC20 to mint with.
params.expectBasketMode: The flag with which the client communicates its expectation of the basket mode status.
params.receiver: The address that will receive Honey.

pause().details: Only the PAUSER role can call this function.

pauseVault(address).details: Only the PAUSER role can call this function.Only registered assets can be paused.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

redeem(address,uint256,address,bool).details: The expectBasketMode flag avoid behavioral issues that may happen when the basket mode status changes after the client signed its transaction.

params.expectBasketMode: The flag with which the client communicates its expectation of the basket mode status.
params.honeyAmount: The amount of Honey to redeem.
params.receiver: The address that will receive assets.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

setCollateralAssetStatus(address,bool).details: Only the manager role can call this function.Only registered assets can be set as bad collateral.If set to true, minting will be disabled for the asset.

setDepegOffsets(address,uint256,uint256).details: Only Manager role can call this function.

setFeeReceiver(address).details: Only the default admin role can call this function.Reverts if the fee receiver address is zero address.

params._feeReceiver: The address of the fee receiver.

setForcedBasketMode(bool).details: Only Manager role can call this function.

setLiquidationRate(address,uint256).details: The `extraRate` is a premium, hence a 0.25 rate means a 1.25 premium factor.

setMaxFeedDelay(uint256).details: It's involved into deeming a collateral asset pegged or not.Only Manager role can call this function.

setPOLFeeCollector(address).details: Only the default admin role can call this function.Reverts if the POL Fee Collector address is zero address.

params._polFeeCollector: The address of the POL Fee Collector.

params.priceOracle_: The new price oracle to use.

params.asset: The collateral asset to which the target applies.
params.target: The target amount with the token's decimals.

unpause().details: only the MANAGER role can call this function.

unpauseVault(address).details: Only the MANAGER role can call this function.Only registered assets can be unpaused.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

withdrawAllFees(address).details: It loops over all the registered assets and withdraws the collected fees.

collectedFees(address,address).notice: Mapping of receiver to asset to collected fee.

feeReceiver().notice: The address of the fee receiver.

forcedBasketMode().notice: Whether the basket mode is forced regardless of the price oracle

getWeights().notice: Get weights of all the registered assets except for the paused ones.

isBasketModeEnabled(bool).notice: Get the status of the basket mode.

isPegged(address).notice: Get if an asset is pegged or not.

minSharesToRecapitalize().notice: The minimum amount of shares that the user have to mint to recapitalize

mint(address,uint256,address,bool).notice: Mint Honey by sending ERC20 to this contract.

mintRates(address).notice: Mint rate of Honey for each asset, 60.18-decimal fixed-point number representation

pauseVault(address).notice: Pause the vault for a given asset.

polFeeCollector().notice: The address of the POL Fee Collector.

polFeeCollectorFeeRate().notice: The rate of POLFeeCollector fees, 60.18-decimal fixed-point number representation

priceFeedMaxDelay().notice: The max number of seconds of tolerated staleness

recapitalizeBalanceThreshold(address).notice: The target balance for recapitalization of each asset

redeem(address,uint256,address,bool).notice: Redeem assets by sending Honey in to burn.

redeemRates(address).notice: Redemption rate of Honey for each asset, 60.18-decimal fixed-point number representation

setCollateralAssetStatus(address,bool).notice: Set the bad collateral status of an asset.

setDepegOffsets(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Set lower and upper depeg offset for an asset.

setForcedBasketMode(bool).notice: Set the forced basket mode status.

setLiquidationEnabled(bool).notice: Set whether the liquidation is enabled or not.

setLiquidationRate(address,uint256).notice: Set the liquidation rate for an asset

setMaxFeedDelay(uint256).notice: Set the max tolerated number of seconds for oracle staleness.

setMinSharesToRecapitalize(uint256).notice: Set the minimum amount of shares that the user have to mint to recapitalize

setMintRate(address,uint256).notice: Set the mint rate of Honey for an asset.

setPOLFeeCollector(address).notice: Set the POL Fee Collector address.

setRecapitalizeBalanceThreshold(address,.notice: Set the target balance for recapitalization.

setRedeemRate(address,uint256).notice: Set the redemption rate of Honey for an asset.

setReferenceCollateral(address).notice: Set the reference collateral for cap limits.

unpauseVault(address).notice: Unpause the vault for a given asset.

vaults(address).notice: Mapping of assets to their corresponding vaults.

withdrawAllFees(address).notice: Withdraw all the collected fees for a `receiver`.

withdrawFee(address,address).notice: Withdraw the collected fees for a `receiver` for a specific `asset`.
